quotes.text: Once you choose hope, anything's possible.
quotes.author: Christopher Reeve

quotes.text: Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Hope arouses, as nothing else can arouse, a passion for the possible.
quotes.author: William Sloane Coffin

quotes.text: All human wisdom is summed up in two words; wait and hope.
quotes.author: Alexandre Dumas

quotes.text: All that I am, or hope to be, I owe to my angel mother.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: Creativity comes from trust. Trust your instincts. And never hope more than you work.
quotes.author: Rita Mae Brown

quotes.text: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: The grand essentials of happiness are: something to do, something to love, and something to hope for.
quotes.author: Alexander Chalmers

quotes.text: How wonderful that we have met with a paradox. Now we have some hope of making progress.
quotes.author: Niels Bohr

quotes.text: I find hope in the darkest of days, and focus in the brightest. I do not judge the universe.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: All the great things are simple, and many can be expressed in a single word: freedom, justice, honor, duty, mercy, hope.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Faith, as well intentioned as it may be, must be built on facts, not fiction--faith in fiction is a damnable false hope.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.text: I hope our wisdom will grow with our power, and teach us, that the less we use our power the greater it will be.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: You may say I'm a dreamer, but I'm not the only one, I hope someday you will join us, and the world will live as one.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: Most of the important things in the world have been accomplished by people who have kept on trying when there seemed to be no hope at all.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.text: You cannot change anything in your life with intention alone, which can become a watered-down, occasional hope that you'll get to tomorrow. Intention without action is useless.
quotes.author: Caroline Myss

quotes.text: Sometimes our fate resembles a fruit tree in winter. Who would think that those branches would turn green again and blossom, but we hope it, we know it.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.text: I hope we shall crush in its birth the aristocracy of our monied corporations which dare already to challenge our government to a trial by strength, and bid defiance to the laws of our country.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: You are not here merely to make a living. You are here in order to enable the world to live more amply, with greater vision, with a finer spirit of hope and achievement. You are here to enrich the world, and you impoverish yourself if you forget the errand.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.text: Perpetual optimism is a force multiplier.
quotes.author: Colin Powell
